problem_text: Triangle W X Y has an area of 248 square inches. Find the length of the base.
source: Textbook 2_Chapter 11 - Areas of Polygons and Circles.pdf
compact_text: Triangle WXY has an area of 248 square inches. Find the length of the base.
annotat_text: Triangle $WXY$ has an area of 248 square inches. Find the length of the base.
